simulator.payloads

Class PhysicalNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.payloads.NetworkScheduler
      • simulator.payloads.PhysicalNetwork
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeSensitive

    public class PhysicalNetwork
extends NetworkScheduler
    Implement physical state representation of the system as a message passing network. Physical state "messages" are non-blocking, which means they are received in the same simulation instant that they are sent.

      • getFrameworkConnection

        public NetworkScheduler.Connection getFrameworkConnection()
        Get a connection with both time- and event-triggered interfaces. This is used for system objects and runtime monitors, and may not be used by students directly.
